00009  *

00012  * $LastChangedBy: sra $
00013  * $LastChangedDate: 2009-04-22 14:28:30 +0200 (Mi, 22 Apr 2009) $
00014  */
00015  /*
00016  * $Log$
00017  */
00018 
00019 #include "ntrxtypes.h"
00020 #include "hwclock.h"
00021 #include "keys.h"
00022 
00023 /*FIXME this implementation works only fine for one key*/
00024 static bool_t keyPressed[NKEYS] = {FALSE,FALSE,FALSE};
00025 static uint32_t keyPressedStartTime[NKEYS] = {0,0,0};
00026 
00027 
00028 /*******************************************************************/
00029 uint8_t GetKeyState(uint8_t key_index)
00030 {
00031     if (key_flags[key_index])
00032     {
00033         uint32_t now = (uint32_t) hwclock();
00034         uint32_t tDiff;
00035         /*has the key been just pressed?*/
00036         if (!keyPressed[key_index]){
00037             /*branch here once right after the key has been pressed*/
00038             keyPressed[key_index] = TRUE;
00039             keyPressedStartTime[key_index] = now;
00040         }
00041         tDiff = now - keyPressedStartTime[key_index];
00042         if (tDiff > 5000) return KEY_PRESSED_FOR_5S;
00043         if (tDiff > 4000) return KEY_PRESSED_FOR_4S;
00044         if (tDiff > 3000) return KEY_PRESSED_FOR_3S;
00045         if (tDiff > 2000) return KEY_PRESSED_FOR_2S;
00046         if (tDiff > 1000) return KEY_PRESSED_FOR_1S;
00047         return KEY_PRESSED;
00048     }else
00049     {
00050         /*has the key been just released?*/
00051         if (keyPressed[key_index]){
00052             /*branch here once right after the key has been released*/
00053             uint32_t now = (uint32_t) hwclock();
00054             uint32_t tDiff = now - keyPressedStartTime[key_index];
00055             /*reset everything*/
00056             keyPressed[key_index] = FALSE;
00057             keyPressedStartTime[key_index] = 0;
00058             /*return key pressing duration*/
00059             if (tDiff > 5000) return KEY_REL_AFTER_5S;
00060             if (tDiff > 4000) return KEY_REL_AFTER_4S;
00061             if (tDiff > 3000) return KEY_REL_AFTER_3S;
00062             if (tDiff > 2000) return KEY_REL_AFTER_2S;
00063             if (tDiff > 1000) return KEY_REL_AFTER_1S;
00064             if (tDiff >   10) return KEY_REL_AFTER_10MS;
00065         }
00066 
00067         return KEY_NOT_PRESSED;
00068     }
00069 }
